previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. Colorado Rapids | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 2, Colorado Rapids 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Colorado Rapids look to end their 11-game winless streak at the StubHub Center as they visit Chivas USA.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs Colorado Rapids

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Charles Eloundou (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy gets a hold of Eloundou’s low shot from distance

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt saved. Charles Eloundou (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by John Neeskens.

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: #CHVvCOL now underway at the @StubHubCenter. Watch live on @TWCDeportes or follow on http://t.co/YvqFq5L6nl http://t.co/hj3VIkpARf

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Charles Eloundou (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is blocked. Assisted by Dillon Powers.

Charles Eloundou (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA).
Attempt missed. Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) left footed shot from long range on the left is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Leandro Barrera.

timelineItems.name: CoCo Sanchez
timelineItems.text: He never was ready...needs at least two more years to learn how to coach before managing club again but of course they won't fire #CHVvCOL

timelineItems.desc: The Colorado Rapids head to the coast to face off against Chivas USA at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA vs Colorado Rapids | October 11th, 2014

timelineItems.text: Well, player ratings just gone fun #Rapids96 @Burgundywave

timelineItems.text: Great counter for Colorado but Kennedy cheating big time . Good finish from neiskens but better flick :-0 #CHVvCOL

timelineItems.text: It's not just his first career goal. @johnneeskens scored a beauty. Now 1-0 Colorado. #CHVvCOL

timelineItems.name: John Rosch
timelineItems.text: Hell, I would settle for a goal from Earls on an assist from Palguta if it meant we would win. #Rapids96

timelineItems.text: Finally got the #forclubandcountry #scarf #chivasusa #ussoccer

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Eloundou is putting Kennedy to work tonight. He's looking for a goal. #CHVvCOL

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: In case you were wondering if Chivas USA fixed all their problems last week, the horrible defending on Neeskins' goal solves that mystery.

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: 2nt u see Col just has so much more talent, I don't get the record? , still mistakes in shape at the back but you see the depth #CHVvCOL

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Forgot to mention earlier, on the local broadcast, analyst says, "Cubo, Cubo...donde esta? We need you."

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: Eloundou and Neeskens both showed in #Rapids96 Reserves game on Monday. Mastroeni seemed impress with the fight #RapidsReserves showed.

timelineItems.text: I don't imagine Pablo told Eloundou to "Wherever, whenever, Shoot as soon as you get the ball." #Rapids96

timelineItems.text: Came to visit some friends on this side of the pitch for once, and view the game from here, ☺️⚽️🙌Chivas USA v Colorado Rapids ⚽️😁😈 I Love Soccer ⚽️😈🐐 baaaahh! Ha 😈 Fear it! 😁⚽️😜🐐🙌#MLS #ILoveSoccer #ChivasUSA #CHVvCOL #ColoradoRapids #win #Soccer

timelineItems.name: CoCo Sanchez
timelineItems.text: The entire Rapids midfield is a no show as it's the two strikes versus 7 defenders, poor coaching decisions every single match #CHVvCOL

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez

timelineItems.text: Man. We are the Washington Generals for absolutely everyone. #Rapids96
